name: Component.RadModal.Header

classitems.description: If you want that header to have some pop
classitems.name: brand

classitems.description: Computed css class bound to component. Handled by component to allow for flexibility in future updates to branding class names
classitems.name: brandClass

classitems.description: Controls display of the modal header close button. Is defaulted to true and can be set to false in order to suppress the header close button.
classitems.name: closeButton

classitems.description: Controls the SVG Id of the close button.
classitems.name: closeIcon

classitems.description: Closure action bound to header close button.
classitems.name: closeModal

classitems.description: The elementId of this component must be set to match the aria-labelledby of the parent component. This is handled through the contextual component setup of rad-modal
classitems.name: elementId

classitems.description:
Pass a (hash) of tagging properties when you need to bind a tag fire to close of the modal. Expects syntax:

(hash category='Tag Category' action='Tag Action' label='Tag Label')
classitems.name: tagclose

description:
Used to handle rendering a header for an Ember Radical Modal. Should always be accessed via the Header prop or components hash of rad-modal.

Accessibility

This component should only be used as a contextual component within a rad-modal instance. The parent rad-modal handles setting the elementId of this component to match an aria-labelledby on the parent modal. This ensures that screen readers are able to correctly associate the modal header with the modal that it labels. Some form of a Header is always required for instances of Core Modal to ensure that they are properly labelled.

Configurations

  • brand: When accessing the header subcomponent in block form, you can use this property to access and apply standard branding classes to the header, e.g. 'primary' or 'secondary' .
  • closeButton: Controls display of the header close button. Set to false to hide close button.
  • tagClose: Pass an object of tagging data to have a tag event fired on click of header close button
